allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add aarch64-linux builder and operational docs

Enable nix.linux-builder for cross-compiling aarch64-linux packages
on macOS via QEMU. Add RUNBOOK.md with builder operational reference
and update CLAUDE.md to point to it.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/jonpark/projects/thelab-rc commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

Add linux-builder debugging journal entry. Reframe CLAUDE.md as a
map of content \(MOC\) hub linking to related repos.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
